children.value: To repair the Tab Order on a slide:
If your presentation has slide numbers or a footer make sure that they have
To do this, press Alt + N, S, N or click the Insert Ribbon and choose
Click on any slide element or Tab to it.
Choose Drawing Tools, Selection Pane or press Alt + J, A, P.
The Selection Pane opens to the right of the slide.
The elements of the slide are listed from last to first in the Selection Pane.
Click on the slide element that needs to be reordered and use the Up or
Down Arrow in the Selection Pane to move it to its logical reading order/Tab
You can test the order in which elements will be read/accessed by someone
who can't see the slide by pressing the tab key which will move you through
the elements of the slide in their "logical reading order."
Repeat this process for all slide elements that are not in their correct order
and for all slides in your presentation.
